translation.en: [woman] It came to me in a dream.
translation.es: Se me ocurrió durante un sueño.

translation.en: Hair is beauty.
Hair is emotion.
Hair is our heritage.
Hair tells us who we are, where we've been,
translation.es: El pelo nos dice quiénes somos, dónde hemos estado

translation.en: and where we're going.
-My name is Sarah Breedlove. -[crowd cheering]
Making products for our hair is my passion.
translation.es: Hacer productos para nuestro pelo es mi pasión.

translation.en: Hasn't been easy,
but no matter what, I refuse to give up the fight.
translation.es: pero pase lo que pase, me niego a abandonar la pelea.

translation.en: Addie Munroe's Magical Hair Grower!
Fifty cents a tin. Get Magical Hair Grower right here!
translation.es: Cincuenta centavos la lata. ¡Compren el Crecepelo Mágico aquí!

translation.en: You got dandruff, ma'am?
You got bald patches?
Hair that won't grow? I got your fix! Right here, ladies!
translation.es: ¿Pelo que no crece? ¡Tengo la solución! ¡Aquí, señoras!

translation.en: Magical Hair Grow--
[woman] Heard of that stuff.
Do it work?
Saved my life.
[Sarah] Hair is power.
You can't imagine what it's like to lose it.
translation.es: No te imaginas lo que es perderlo.

translation.en: Seems like I was born to struggle.
The life of a washerwoman is hard.
translation.es: La vida de una lavandera es difícil.

translation.en: I'd scrub my fingers to the bone for pennies.
translation.es: Fregaba por centavos hasta más no poder.

translation.en: Most days, I can't even make ends meet.
translation.es: La mayoría del tiempo, ni siquiera llegaba a fin de mes.

translation.en: After a while, I guess I just lost hope-- forgot how to dream.
translation.es: Después de un tiempo, perdí la esperanza. Olvidé cómo soñar.

translation.en: That's when my hair started falling out.
translation.es: Entonces se me empezó a caer el pelo.

translation.en: My husband Davis only made things worse.
translation.es: Mi esposo, Davis, solo empeoró las cosas.

translation.en: He was arrested, and when he came back, he was a changed man.
translation.es: Lo arrestaron, y cuando regresó, era otro hombre.

translation.en: [Davis] You look like a mangy dog.
-[Sarah] Baby, wait, don't go. -[Davis] No.
[Sarah] Please. Davis.
[Sarah] I was devastated.
Didn't know what I was gonna do.
I used to wonder if God don't like ugly,
translation.es: Solía preguntarme: "Si a Dios no le gustan las cosas feas,

translation.en: why did he make me?
With so much beauty in this world, how come I got so little?
translation.es: Con tanta belleza en este mundo, ¿por qué yo tengo tan poca?

translation.en: And then everything changed.
I'm Addie Munroe, and I would like to talk with you
translation.es: Soy Addie Munroe, y me gustaría hablar con usted

translation.en: about my new hair product.
translation.es: de mi nuevo producto para el pelo.

translation.en: You all right?
Is anyone here?
I'm-- I'm gonna help you.
It's gonna be just fine.
Oh, dear.
Oh, it's okay.
What happened?
I started using the Hair Grower that day.
translation.es: Empecé a usar el producto ese día.

translation.en: In a few months' time, my hair came back.
translation.es: En unos meses, mi pelo volvió.

translation.en: Look at how your hair is growing.
Thanks to you.
I don't know why I'm so surprised. My Magical Hair Grower is magical.
translation.es: No sé por qué me sorprende. Mi Crecepelo es mágico.

translation.en: Yes, indeed, Addie.
Yes, indeed.
[Sarah] Addie's Hair Grower worked.
My hair grew back.
And so did my confidence.
Now I got me a new man, CJ, who loves me and treats me right.
translation.es: Ahora tengo un hombre nuevo, C. J., que me ama y me trata bien.

translation.en: My hair grew back so good, I thought, maybe I could sell it myself.
translation.es: Mi pelo volvió a crecer tan bien que pensé en vender el producto yo misma.

translation.en: That's why I wanna sell your Hair Grower.
translation.es: Por eso quiero vender tu Crecepelo.

translation.en: That's why I wanna sell your Hair Grower.
translation.es: Por eso quiero vender tu Crecepelo.

translation.en: That's why I wanna sell your Hair Grower.
translation.es: Por eso quiero vender tu Crecepelo.

translation.en: But what do I say when the customers complain about the sulfur smell?
translation.es: ¿Qué digo si las clientas se quejan del olor a azufre?

translation.en: Oh, smile and say, "That's how you know the product is working."
translation.es: Sonríe y di: "Así es como sabes que el producto funciona".

translation.en: Here.
I put it on at night.
translation.es: Yo lo uso por las noches.

translation.en: Tie it up real good.
By morning, the smell's gone. Mostly.
translation.es: Para la mañana, ya casi no huele más.

translation.en: Now that's a tasty idea. Thanks.
[Addie] If a washerwoman like Sarah can figure it out,
translation.es: Si una lavandera como Sarah puede resolverlo,

translation.en: y'all should have no problem.
You've just got to convince the customers
translation.es: Solo deben convencer a las clientas

translation.en: that by using my product, that they'll look like me.
translation.es: de que al usar mi producto, se verán como yo.

translation.en: Or you all, at least.
[laughs] What?
No. No...
But, it... It works. Trust me.
You gals will be fine. You'll get the hang of it soon.
translation.es: Les va a ir bien. Aprenderán rápido.

translation.en: In the meantime, just smile a lot.
They just get younger and dumber, don't they?
translation.es: Son cada vez más jóvenes y más tontas.

translation.en: Maybe I could sell your product.
translation.es: Quizá yo pueda vender tu producto.

translation.en: I'd be honored, in fact.
I don't think sales is for you. [laughs]
translation.es: No creo que las ventas sean para ti.

translation.en: I've been singing your praises for almost two years.
translation.es: He estado hablando bien de ti por casi dos años.

translation.en: I got you, what? Eight new customers?
Mmm. That's not the same as selling door-to-door, though.
translation.es: No es lo mismo que vender de puerta en puerta.

translation.en: Oh, I know everything about Hair Grower. I'm proof that it works.
translation.es: Sé todo sobre el Crecepelo. Soy prueba de que funciona.

translation.en: Sarah, I know what I'm doing.
It's business.
Nothing personal.
Hiring a bunch of mulatto gals to con folks ain't gonna work.
translation.es: Usar unas mulatas para estafar gente no funcionará.

translation.en: Even a fool knows they didn't get good hair from your product.
translation.es: Hasta un tonto sabe que tu producto no les dio ese buen pelo.

translation.en: Their mamas and grandmamas got raped.
translation.es: Violaron a sus madres y abuelas.

translation.en: Language.
All I'm saying is...
when a customer looks at my hair,
they'll know they're seeing what your product can do.
translation.es: sabrá lo que tu producto puede lograr.

translation.en: Colored women will do anything to look like me.
translation.es: Las mujeres de color harán lo que sea para verse como yo.

translation.en: Even if deep down they know they can't.
translation.es: Aunque en el fondo sepan que no pueden.

translation.en: Now we've got a good arrangement here.
Laundry for hair treatments.
translation.es: Lavandería a cambio de tratamientos capilares.

translation.en: Let's not complicate things.
You saw the laundry in the back.
translation.es: Viste la ropa que está atrás.

translation.en: I'll have it for you on Friday.
[Sarah] I was hesitant at first, but then I realized...
translation.es: Dudé al principio, pero luego me di cuenta...

translation.en: this is my calling.
That I could help others the way Addie helped me.
translation.es: Que podía ayudar a otros como Addie me ayudó a mí.

translation.en: And that's why I'm here.
It worked for me.
It'll work for y'all.
That's one hell of a story.
Give me one tin.
Thank you.
Me too.
-[woman 1] I'll take one. -[woman 2] How much is it?
translation.es: - Quiero una. - ¿Cuánto es? ¿Hace crecer el pelo?

translation.en: [woman 3] She said it grow hair?
[woman 4] Thank you, baby.
[woman 5] It's worth the money.
[woman 6] I can't wait to try!
[Sarah] Let me know how you doin' with it. Check back in.
-All right, then! -Thank you!
♪They just wanna talk that stuff Till I hit 'em with the realness ♪
-Sarah? What are you doin' here? -[Sarah] I did it.
I sold 20 tins.
What now?
I borrowed a few tins of your Hair Grower.
After I told you no?
Just to see if I could sell 'em!
But you can't. It don't make sense!
-I figured if I just showed you-- -[Addie] You stole from me?
After everything I've done for you?
translation.es: ¿Después de todo lo que hice por ti?

translation.en: No, I'd never steal from you! I brought all the money. It's all for you!
translation.es: ¡No, nunca te robaría! Te traje todo el dinero.

translation.en: I got you back on your feet.
I confided in you.
How could you?
I just wanted to show you that I can sell.
We can make a lot of money together. I got ideas--
translation.es: Podemos ganar mucho dinero juntas. Tengo ideas...

translation.en: Are you out of your mind?
Even in your Sunday best,
you look like you just stepped off the plantation.
translation.es: pareces recién salida de la plantación.

translation.en: These are my products.
And I will not have the likes of you associated with them.
translation.es: Y no tendré gente como tú asociada con ellos.

translation.en: Sorry for overstepping.
translation.es: Perdón por pasarme de la raya.

translation.en: It won't happen again.
Sarah!
For Addie's newest sales agent.
translation.es: Para la nueva vendedora de Addie.

translation.en: What happened?
I ain't got the right look.
translation.es: Mi imagen no es la correcta.

translation.en: Now, wait a minute, now you...
You're the most beautiful woman in the world.
translation.es: Eres la mujer más hermosa del mundo.

translation.en: -Stop. -[CJ] No.
All these years I done made ads, I'd drawn every type of face there is.
translation.es: En estos años que hice anuncios, dibujé todo tipo de rostro.

translation.en: And ain't none more beautiful than yours.
translation.es: No hay uno más hermoso que el tuyo.

translation.en: Tell me what happened.
She treated me like I was nothing, CJ.
translation.es: Me trató como si no fuera nada, C. J.

translation.en: I thought we was friends.
Week after week, I sat in that chair. Told her stuff I ain't never told nobody.
translation.es: Todas las semanas me siento ahí. Le conté cosas que nunca conté.

translation.en: I should've known I was just a customer to her.
translation.es: Debí haber sabido que era otra clienta más.

translation.en: And an ugly one at that.
Okay, stop.
I ain't gonna let you keep beating up on yourself, you hear?
translation.es: No dejaré que te castigues así.

translation.en: You hear me?
I love you, CJ.
[CJ chuckles] Come here.
What you makin'?
From now on, I'm doing my own hair, making my own hair grower.
translation.es: De ahora en más, cuidaré mi pelo con mi propio crecepelo.

translation.en: I'm through with Addie Munroe.
[woman] Mama!
What you doin' up?
Just workin' on a little something. Sit, there's something I wanna try.
translation.es: Trabajo en algo. Siéntate, quiero probar una cosa.

translation.en: What is it?
Hair grower. Maybe.
Just something I'm fiddling around with.
Mmm. Smells better than Addie's already.
translation.es: Huele mejor que el de Addie.

translation.en: Just trying to figure out the right mix.
Where you been?
[woman] Ray Ray's Bar was hot tonight,
translation.es: El bar de Ray Ray estaba lleno hoy,

translation.en: and me and John was dancing the Big Bear Dance all night long.
translation.es: y John y yo bailamos el baile del oso toda la noche.

translation.en: Just... mm-mm-mmm.
-John, huh? -Mm-hmm.
[laughs] The guitar player?
Sit... Sit your behind down!
What did I tell you about that sponger?
[sighs] You ain't even met him yet.
I can tell by the way you talk about him, he ain't got no money.
translation.es: Me doy cuenta por cómo hablas de él que no tiene dinero.

translation.en: I know you think I'm puttin' on airs.
But... you ain't cute or clever enough
translation.es: pero no eres lo suficientemente linda o inteligente

translation.en: to survive gettin' knocked up by some do-nothin' musician.
translation.es: como para sobrevivir con un bebé de un músico que no sabe hacer nada.

translation.en: Gotta find somebody who'll make your life better. Like CJ.
translation.es: Encuentra alguien que te mejore la vida, como C. J.

translation.en: Not having this conversation again.
translation.es: No tendré esta conversación otra vez.

translation.en: You're too idle.
You need to call Dr. Collins.
He stood me up, remember?
That glass eye he got give me the willies.
translation.es: Su ojo de vidrio me da escalofríos.

translation.en: So? He's a doctor. And you ain't gettin' much younger.
translation.es: ¿Y? Es doctor. Y tú estás envejeciendo.

translation.en: You either go to college or find yourself a husband, you hear?
translation.es: O vas a la universidad o te buscas un marido, ¿oíste?

translation.en: -[groans] -What's wrong?
My scalp is on fire, Mama.
Okay, that's the last time I make it with lye. Come on!
Ooh! Just gotta get it out.
-[laughs] -[woman 1] Thank you, sister Sarah.
[woman 2] My hair grew two inches! [woman 1] God bless you.
translation.es: - ¡Me creció cinco centímetros! - Dios te bendiga.

translation.en: Hair Grower works!
[Lelia] Mama, you did it! You made a beautiful hair grower.
translation.es: ¡Mamá, lo lograste! Hiciste un crecepelo genial.

translation.en: I'm so proud of you.
-Here you go. -[woman] Okay.
Sarah, I hear you. Open up.
Just a minute!
A few weeks ago, you left clean laundry on my doorstep.
translation.es: Hace unas semanas, dejaste ropa limpia en mi puerta.

translation.en: Then, nothing.
Thought maybe the Klan got you.
translation.es: Creí que el Klan te había atacado.

translation.en: [coughs] Well, been a little sick.
You might not wanna get too close.
You can imagine my surprise when I heard Sarah Breedlove not only lives...
translation.es: Imagínate mi sorpresa cuando escuché que Sarah Breedlove no solo está viva,

translation.en: but is out testing hair grower.
translation.es: sino que está probando un crecepelo.

translation.en: -Me? That ain't-- -Better not be my tins.
translation.es: - ¿Yo? No... - Espero no sean mis latas.

translation.en: Rest assured...
we're settled up.
You really think you can compete with me?
[smacks lips] Suit yourself,
but you'll fail soon enough.
And when you do,
I got a hamper full of dirty laundry with your name on it.
translation.es: tengo un cesto lleno de ropa sucia con tu nombre.

translation.en: -CJ! -[CJ] Hmm?
-[laughs] CJ! -[CJ] Hmm?
Your sister wants me to send her 20 jars of Hair Grower,
translation.es: Tu hermana quiere que le mande 20 frascos del crecepelo,

translation.en: and she sent me money.
Peg-- Peggie sent money?
It's a miracle!
I think God is finally smiling down on me.
translation.es: Creo que Dios finalmente me sonríe.

translation.en: She said she let her choir director try some of the product I sent,
translation.es: Dijo que la directora del coro probó el producto que le envié

translation.en: and now all the sopranos want it.
translation.es: y ahora todas las sopranos lo quieren.

translation.en: Huh. It says here, more Negroes are moving to Indianapolis.
translation.es: Dice que varios negros se están mudando a Indianápolis.

translation.en: Property is cheap now on account of the recession and factories closing.
translation.es: Las propiedades están baratas por la recesión y por el cierre de fábricas.

translation.en: As soon as Negroes move in, white folks run for the hills.
translation.es: En cuanto los negros se mudan, los blancos huyen despavoridos.

translation.en: -[Sarah laughs] -Can you imagine?
Ofays go broke and they just up and close a factory,
translation.es: Los blancos van a quiebra y cierran una fábrica.

translation.en: I mean, a whole factory, just like that.
Mmm. How is Cleophus gettin' along all by his lonesome?
translation.es: ¿Cómo le va a Cleophus allí solo?

translation.en: -Only your sister to look after him? -Daddy's doin' just fine.
translation.es: - Solo tu hermana lo cuida. - Papá está bien.

translation.en: What you gettin' at?
My product is just as good as Addie's.
translation.es: Mi producto es tan bueno como el de Addie.

translation.en: Maybe better.
Definitely smells better.
I can't be a washerwoman for the rest of my life, CJ.
translation.es: No puedo ser lavandera el resto de mi vida.

translation.en: Miss Jessie said there's three million Negro women in America.
translation.es: La señora Jessie dijo que hay tres millones de mujeres negras en EE. UU.

translation.en: If I can get 'em all to buy just one jar of Hair Grower, I'll be a millionaire.
translation.es: Si logro que todas compren un solo frasco, sería millonaria.

translation.en: -Well, I can't argue with that. -Yeah.
translation.es: - No puedo decir que no. - Sí.

translation.en: We'd have to leave St. Louis, though.
translation.es: Tendríamos que irnos de San Luis.

translation.en: I'd never get anywhere in Addie Munroe's shadow.
translation.es: Nunca lograría nada bajo la sombra de Addie Munroe.

translation.en: I ain't movin' to Indianapolis.
I love you, but I ain't movin'.
translation.es: Te amo, pero no lo haré.

translation.en: I ain't movin'.
[Sarah] Indianapolis, here we come!
Where is Lelia? She better not make us miss this train.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está Lelia? Espero que no nos haga perder el tren.

translation.en: Breaking up with John, thank Jesus.
translation.es: Se está separando de John, gracias a Dios.

translation.en: [Lelia] Mama!
[laughing] Mama!
We got hitched.
[laughs] You almost had me.
Nice to finally meet you, John.
You're a good sport to help with her luggage.
translation.es: Gracias por ayudarla con su equipaje.

translation.en: -But we gotta be on our way. -No, Mama.
John is my husband. He's comin' with us.
translation.es: John es mi esposo. Viene con nosotros.

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Mom.
Lord, what did you do?
I got married, like you said.
Welcome to the family, son.
translation.es: Bienvenido a la familia, hijo. Buena suerte.

translation.en: -Good luck. -You pregnant?
translation.es: Bienvenido a la familia, hijo. Buena suerte. - ¿Estás embarazada? - ¡No! Lo amo.

translation.en: No! I love him.
And he's not a do-nothin' either.
John's gonna open a juke joint.
-[Sarah] A juke joint? -[John] Mm-hmm.
Let's go.
I did like you said.
I found a rat.
Easy, Cleophus. Money's tight. We gotta make it stretch.
translation.es: Con cuidado, Cleophus. Tenemos poco dinero. Debe durarnos.

translation.en: Missy, I sure don't mind helpin',
but I don't take orders no more.
Lincoln freed me 40 years back!
That's why I'm gonna pay you.
And that's why you're my favorite daughter-in-law!
translation.es: ¡Y por eso eres mi nuera favorita!

translation.en: Keep your eyes on your work. You're spilling more than you're filling.
translation.es: Concéntrate en tu trabajo. Derramas más de lo que llenas.

translation.en: Can I have my paper back?
If you don't like it here, you're welcome to find yourself other lodging, gainful employment.
translation.es: Si no te gusta estar aquí, puedes irte y buscar un empleo lucrativo.

translation.en: Yeah, how's that juke joint coming?
From now on...
you on rat duty.
And take that hat off! You're inside.
Yes, ma'am.
Living room window.
Baby, you got to show the people some razzle-dazzle. Some hope!
translation.es: Debes darle a la gente algo deslumbrante, algo de esperanza.

translation.en: Well, but not false hope.
I ain't promisin' long, silky hair or whatever you put in this ad.
translation.es: No prometo pelo largo y sedoso, o lo que pusiste en este anuncio.

translation.en: -What you want me to change? -Work in my story.
translation.es: - ¿Qué quieres que cambie? - Pon mi historia.

translation.en: Make it personal. Add some testimonials or something.
translation.es: Hazlo personal. Agrega testimonios o algo así.

translation.en: Folks will take a chance on my product if they believe in me. Right, Peggie?
translation.es: La gente comprará si cree en mí. - ¿No, Peggie? - Sí. Debes tener corazón.

translation.en: Yup! You gotta have heart.
Okay. Okay, Peggie.
I'll see what I can do.
[Sarah] Walker Hair Company. Got a nice ring to it, don't it?
Gotta admit, you're sure on to something.
Hair is in our blood.
translation.es: El pelo está en nuestra sangre.

translation.en: All your uncles were barbers.
Just 'cause they've gone on to glory don't mean their legacy gotta die too.
translation.es: Solo porque murieron no significa que su legado también deba morir.

translation.en: One day all of this will be yours.
translation.es: Un día, todo esto será tuyo.

translation.en: I want you to learn the business.
-Why? -Do something with your education.
I got a husband now.
Who is about as useful as a bucket without a bottom.
translation.es: Que es tan útil como un balde sin fondo.

translation.en: Well, John and I are still gonna open up that juke joint.
translation.es: John y yo abriremos una cantina.

translation.en: I think he found a barn just outside of town.
translation.es: Halló un granero en las afueras de la ciudad.

translation.en: -[woman] Thank you. -There you go.
After all I went through to get out of the South?
translation.es: ¿Después de todo lo que hice para sacarte del sur?

translation.en: Washed clothes till my hands were raw to put you through school.
translation.es: Lavé ropa hasta más no poder para que fueras a la escuela.

translation.en: Maybe even college.
Now all you wanna do is serve liquor to ex-cons and hustlers.
translation.es: Y ahora solo quieres servirle licor a exconvictos y estafadores.

translation.en: Hair is your dream, not mine.
translation.es: El pelo es tu sueño, no el mío.

translation.en: -So what's your dream? -I don't know yet.
translation.es: - ¿Cuál es tu sueño? - Aún no lo sé.

translation.en: So what happens when John runs off with a bar floozy?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasará cuando John se vaya con una zorra del bar?

translation.en: Then what?
Either you're back with me, or you're whoring.
Well, John says I have a knack for entertaining.
translation.es: John dice que tengo talento para el entretenimiento.

translation.en: Right. So whorin', then.
You can be so cold-blooded sometimes, Mama.
translation.es: Puedes ser tan fría a veces, mamá.

translation.en: All I'm sayin' is don't gamble your future away on that man.
translation.es: Solo te pido que no arriesgues tu futuro por él.

translation.en: Any man! Always make your own money.
translation.es: ¡Por nadie! Haz siempre tu propio dinero.

translation.en: -But... -Nope, no buts.
-How you doin', ma'am? -[Lelia] Good mornin'.
My name is Lelia, and this is my mama.
translation.es: Me llamo Lelia y ella es mi mamá.

translation.en: We have a product here that I'm sure will change your life.
translation.es: Tenemos un producto que le cambiará la vida.

translation.en: Now, when I tell you this will make your hair grow faster than anything...
translation.es: Cuando le digo que este producto le hará crecer el pelo más rápido...

translation.en: ♪ Have I been hiding? ♪ ♪ Wasting all my days ♪
[Sarah] Y'all ready?
CJ, go downstairs and get some more boxes.
translation.es: C. J., ve abajo y trae más cajas.

translation.en: I don't want my customers to leave empty-handed.
translation.es: No quiero que se vayan con las manos vacías.

translation.en: Of course, babe.
Thank you.
You want me to warm up the leftovers?
I think we made a mistake in moving here.
translation.es: Creo que cometimos un error al mudarnos aquí.

translation.en: Gotta figure something out. Quick. 'Cause we're almost out of money.
translation.es: Debemos pensar en algo rápido, porque ya casi no tenemos dinero.

translation.en: The new hotel downtown... they hiring.
translation.es: El hotel nuevo en el centro está buscando gente.

translation.en: I figure you and me, we can go down there, and...
I could be a bellhop, you can do laundry.
translation.es: Yo podría ser botones, y tú, lavandera.

translation.en: You don't just plant a seed and expect fruit the next day.
translation.es: No siembras una semilla y esperas fruta al día siguiente.

translation.en: The colored women here gotta get used to the idea of somebody else doin' their hair, that's all.
translation.es: Las mujeres deben acostumbrarse a la idea de que alguien más las peine.

translation.en: Baby... you know I always love your big ideas, but--
translation.es: Cariño, sabes que siempre me encantan tus ideas...

translation.en: -I'm not going back to laundry! -Now wait a minute, now.
We done all made sacrifices. You gonna do what's best for this family. You hear?
translation.es: Todos nos sacrificamos. Harás lo mejor para esta familia, ¿oíste?

translation.en: Sarah. Stop.
You got two weeks to turn this around.
translation.es: Tienes dos semanas para mejorar la situación.

translation.en: After that, you gonna do whatsoever it takes to keep food on that table.
translation.es: Después, harás lo que sea para traer comida a la mesa.

translation.en: -Gentlemen, Wonderful Hair Grower? -No, thank you.
You got dandruff, ma'am? Wonderful Hair Grower! ♪ Fight 'em all ♪
Ladies, you got bald patches or dandruff?
For your wife?
Good morning, ladies! You want thick, lovely hair?
translation.es: Buenos días. ¿Quieren un pelo espeso y divino?

translation.en: [Sarah] Wonderful Hair Grower?
-Wonderful Hair Grower, ma'am? -No.
Wonderful Hair Grower, ladies?
Wonderful Hair Grower? Thank you very much!
Yeah, I'm gonna try this!
-[woman 2] Need this! -[woman 1] We was talkin' about this.
Extra, extra! Read all about it!
Black Jack Johnson takes on the Great White Hope
translation.es: ¡Jack Johnson contra la gran esperanza blanca

translation.en: in the fight of the century!
Sisters!
Sisters!
Let's talk about hair.
-[man 1] You all right with that there? -[man 2] Yeah, I'm good.
translation.es: - ¿Está contenta con eso? - Sí, estoy bien.

translation.en: Hair can be freedom or bondage.
translation.es: El pelo puede ser libertad o esclavitud.

translation.en: The choice is yours.
Want a better station in life?
[woman 1] What is she sayin'?
Need to make more money?
Come on.
Let me show you how.
[woman 2] Let's hear what she talkin' about.
translation.es: Escuchemos lo que tiene para decir.

translation.en: I had a Cain versus Abel relationship with my hair.
translation.es: Tuve una relación muy difícil con mi pelo.

translation.en: -Bet some of y'all do too, huh? -[woman 3] Oh, yeah.
translation.es: - Apuesto que algunas de ustedes también. - Sí.

translation.en: See, I was born free.
Two years after emancipation.
translation.es: Dos años después de la Emancipación.

translation.en: Was orphaned by seven.
Married at 14, pregnant at 15, widowed by 20.
translation.es: Casada a los 14, embarazada a los 15, viuda a los 20.

translation.en: Had to fend for myself and my baby girl.
translation.es: Tuve que trabajar para mí y para mi beba.

translation.en: Only work I could find was...
in the fields...
or as a washerwoman.
Didn't have time to take care of my hair.
translation.es: No tenía tiempo para ocuparme de mi pelo.

translation.en: I know you know what I mean.
-[woman 4] Yes. -[Sarah] Hard work on the farm, ain't it?
translation.es: - Sí. - Los campos son trabajo duro.

translation.en: Wanted to work at the new hotel, but they say I ain't got the right look.
translation.es: Quería trabajar en el hotel nuevo, pero dicen que mi aspecto no es el adecuado.

translation.en: How many of y'all know what she talkin' about?
translation.es: ¿Cuántas de ustedes saben de qué habla?

translation.en: [woman 5] Yes, indeed.
They put us down, don't give us nothin'.
translation.es: Nos humillan, no nos dan nada.

translation.en: Tell us we're ugly, make us feel ugly.
translation.es: Dicen que somos feas, nos hacen sentir feas.

translation.en: [woman 6] That's right.
I tell you what. You come by my salon, I'll do your hair for free.
translation.es: Les diré algo. Si vienen a mi peluquería, las peinaré gratis.

translation.en: You got yourself a deal.
Bet you some of y'all are wonderin' why I would do somethin' for nothin'.
translation.es: Apuesto que se preguntan por qué haría algo por nada.

translation.en: [woman 7] Right.
'Cause I know how hard it is to care for our hair.
translation.es: Porque sé lo difícil que es cuidar de nuestro pelo.

translation.en: I know what it's like to not have running water or products made for us.
translation.es: Sé lo que es no tener agua corriente ni productos hechos para nosotras.

translation.en: But most important, I know if she look good, we all look good.
translation.es: Pero lo más importante, sé que si una luce bien, todas lucimos bien.

translation.en: -[woman 1] Yes! -[woman 2] Right about that.
If you look respectable, we all look respectable.
translation.es: Si lucen respetables, todas lucimos respetables.

translation.en: [women] Mmm. That's right.
Everything we do as Negroes reflects back on us.
translation.es: Todo lo que hacemos como negras nos afecta a todas.

translation.en: So if I can help one person, I'm lifting us all up.
translation.es: Si ayudo a una persona, nos estoy ayudando a todas.

translation.en: -[women 3] Yes, lift us. -[woman 4] Okay.
Wonderful Hair Grower gives me the confidence every day...
translation.es: El Crecepelo Maravilloso me da la confianza todos los días

translation.en: ...to beat the enemy.
Slay the demon.
Fight the good fight as a colored woman in America.
translation.es: Luchar por lo justo como una mujer de color.

translation.en: [woman 1] You gotta stand up.
Wonderful Hair leads to wonderful opportunities.
translation.es: El Crecepelo Maravilloso lleva a oportunidades maravillosas.

translation.en: -[woman 1] Yes. Amen! -You hear me?
-Did you hear me? -[woman 3] Yeah, I heard you.
Now, who wants wonderful opportunities?
Come on up and get your opportunity.
Thank you.
Sarah, we need more shampoo!
-You're taking too long! -I'm not gonna rush and burn her.
I'm just asking you to hurry.
Customers can hear y'all.
We need more pullers and pins and oil.
translation.es: Necesitamos más tiradores y alfileres y aceite.

translation.en: -We need help, Sarah. -Help is on the way.
Now I sent Lelia out for supplies, and a gal named Esther,
translation.es: Envié a Lelia por provisiones y vendrá una tal Esther, que me fue recomendada.

translation.en: who came highly recommended, will be here any minute.
translation.es: y vendrá una tal Esther, que me fue recomendada.

translation.en: That's all well and good, but I need to finish this one's hair now.
translation.es: Bien, pero necesito terminar este peinado ahora.

translation.en: -You know how to use a hot comb? -[woman] I do.
translation.es: - ¿Sabes usar un peine caliente? - Yo sí.

translation.en: [Sarah] Be right back.
Mrs. Walker.
-I'm Esther. -Oh.
I can do hair. I can make product. Anything you need.
translation.es: Puedo peinar. Puedo hacer el producto. Lo que necesite.

translation.en: Check these ladies. See who's dry. Get some Hair Grower and oil their scalp,
translation.es: Ve quién está seca, ponle Crecepelo y aceite,

translation.en: don't start pressin' till I make sure you know what you're doin'.
translation.es: pero no lo untes hasta que confíe en ti. - ¡Sarah! - ¡Ya voy!

translation.en: -[CJ]Sarah! -[Sarah] Coming!
Sarah!
Okay!
-Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry, ma'am. -[woman gasps]
I'm sorry.
-Hey. -[CJ] Yeah. Hey.
I'll be right back. Excuse me for a second.
-Listen, we need more help. -I know. Ain't it wonderful?
translation.es: - Mira, necesitamos más ayuda. - Lo sé. ¿No es maravilloso?

translation.en: The Hair Grower's doing so well. We should put out more product.
translation.es: Le va muy bien al Crecepelo. Deberíamos hacer más.

translation.en: -We barely got enough room to live. -Then let's get a bigger place.
translation.es: - Apenas tenemos espacio para vivir. - Busquemos un lugar más grande.

translation.en: Babe--
We just now making a profit. Can we just enjoy it?
translation.es: Por fin estamos ganando dinero. ¿Podemos disfrutar?

translation.en: Tonight...
why don't we get a couple of steaks and a bottle of Cognac
translation.es: ¿por qué no compramos unos filetes y una botella de coñac,

translation.en: and sleep in in the morning?
I want a whole line of products.
translation.es: Quiero toda una línea de productos.

translation.en: Shampoo, pressin' oil,
maybe somethin' for dandruff?
translation.es: tal vez algo para la caspa.

translation.en: I'm gonna make it easier for colored women to take good care of their hair.
translation.es: Haré que las mujeres de color puedan cuidarse fácilmente.

translation.en: There's such a thing as growing too fast.
[Sarah] That's why we gotta be smart about it.
translation.es: Por eso debemos ser listos, hacer las cosas profesionalmente.

translation.en: Do things professional-like. You know any lawyers?
translation.es: Por eso debemos ser listos, hacer las cosas profesionalmente. ¿Conoces a algún abogado?

translation.en: Oh, Sarah.
Yeah, he been braggin' about his cousin just finished law school.
translation.es: Tiene un primo que recién se recibió.

translation.en: Since when you been talkin' to the numbers man?
You want me to call him or not?
[woman] Mister!
Ma'am, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
I studied incorporation at Columbia, yes.
translation.es: Estudié los estatutos en Columbia, sí.

translation.en: So you'll look into it?
Mrs. Walker, business can be ruthless.
-Especially for a-- -Colored woman?
translation.es: - En especial... - ¿Para una mujer de color?

translation.en: Can't be no worse than taking in laundry.
translation.es: No puede ser peor que lavar la ropa.

translation.en: You'll be competing with companies
that make their products for pennies in big factories.
translation.es: que hacen sus productos por centavos en fábricas.

translation.en: That's why I need me a good lawyer. Interested?
translation.es: Por eso necesito un abogado. ¿Te interesa?

translation.en: [man] You beat my suitcase, boy?
No, sir.
You niggers think you're Jack Johnson now.
translation.es: Los negros ahora se creen Jack Johnson.

translation.en: Treat a white man's property any old way.
translation.es: - Trata mejor la propiedad de blancos. - Sí, señor.

translation.en: No, sir. I carefully placed it on the cart. Don't know how it could've gotten scratched.
translation.es: La puse con cuidado en el carrito. No sé cómo se habrá rayado.

translation.en: You're calling me a liar, boy?
How soon can I start?
That's... That's what I'm sayin', Pop. We got big plans for our company.
translation.es: Es lo que digo. Tenemos grandes planes para nuestra compañía.

translation.en: First thing we're gonna do is do what they call incorporating. Make everything legal.
translation.es: Lo primero que haremos será registrarnos, legalizar todo.

translation.en: [Cleophus] Boy, you ain't got no sense.
-What's that you're mumblin' about? -You keep sayin' "our company."
-Sarah calls it her company. -So?
You ain't listenin'. Her idea, her product, her money.
translation.es: No me estás escuchando. Su idea, su producto, su dinero.

translation.en: -My name. -Your name?
You remember Massa Walker?
Nah. You was too young.
When he would talk to us about the plantation,
translation.es: Cuando nos hablaba de la plantación,

translation.en: he'd always say "our field, our house."
Turns out, that son of a bitch didn't free our asses
translation.es: Resulta que ese hijo de perra no nos liberó

translation.en: until two years after the Civil War was over.
translation.es: hasta dos años después de terminada la Guerra Civil.

translation.en: What's your point, old man?
What kind of self-respecting Negro works for his wife?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de negro respetable trabaja para su esposa?

translation.en: I'm making twice as much now than I did back in St. Louis.
translation.es: Gano el doble que en San Luis.

translation.en: Next thing you'll be wearin' a corset!
Man needs something of his own. Especially a colored man.
translation.es: Un hombre necesita algo propio. Especialmente un hombre de color.

translation.en: Never get your money where you get your honey.
translation.es: Nunca consigas tu dinero donde consigues tu miel.

translation.en: [man] One of the great events in sports history.
translation.es: Gran día en la historia del deporte.

translation.en: Heavyweight champion Jack Johnson will defend his crown
translation.es: El campeón de peso pesado Jack Johnson defenderá su título

translation.en: against the man who is already a legend in his time.
translation.es: contra el hombre que ya es una leyenda,

translation.en: Former heavyweight champion James J. Jeffries.
translation.es: el excampeón de peso pesado, James J. Jeffries.

translation.en: [Cleophus] "Jack Johnson throws a thunderous left!
Jeffries counters with a jab!"
Mmm! This cake is good.
When I told you to get some cake, I meant to pass out to the guests.
translation.es: Es para que les sirvas a los invitados.

translation.en: "Jack Johnson moves in with a slug to the jaw!
translation.es: ¡Jack Johnson tira un puñetazo a la mandíbula!

translation.en: Jeffries is down!"
-[men cheering] -Oh! Oh, come on.
Come on, now. Don't fail me now!
Black Jack is winning!
-Oh, I can't-- -Pop!
-Blood pressure-- -Oh, no!
Oh! Oh, God.
-Hurry up, CJ. What is it sayin'? -All right, hold on, man.
translation.es: - De prisa, C. J. ¿Qué dice? - Bien. Resiste.

translation.en: Don't jam on me now!
-What it say, CJ? -All right, here we go.
translation.es: - ¿Qué dice, C. J.? - Bien, aquí vamos.

translation.en: "Jeffries is down. Will the White Hope rise?"
translation.es: "Jeffries se cae. ¿Se levantará la esperanza blanca?

translation.en: The referee calls it. The fight is over. -Black Jack Johnson won! -[all cheering, shouting]
translation.es: El árbitro da la señal. La pelea termina. ¡Gana el Negro Johnson!".

translation.en: [Sarah] It's our time now, baby!
Oh, Peggie! Can you believe it?
Sarah, you need to see this.
Addie Munroe has moved here, and she's opening up a salon.
translation.es: Addie Munroe se mudó aquí y abrirá una peluquería.

translation.en: Mama, where are you goin'? You don't have to worry about Addie!
Your place is bigger.
You got more products, more customers, more...
translation.es: Tienes más productos, más clientas, más...

translation.en: Oh, no. You can't compete with that.
translation.es: Ay, no. No puedes competir con eso.

translation.en: [Sarah] "Oh, no" is right.
Addie!
As I live and breathe. Look who it is, Mama!
translation.es: Vaya, vaya. Mira quién es, mamá.

translation.en: Afternoon.
[Lelia] How long you and Jean been in Indianapolis?
translation.es: ¿Hace cuánto que tú y Gene están aquí?

translation.en: Oh, I'm afraid that Jean's passed.
[Lelia] So sorry for your loss.
Yeah, you have our condolences.
Thank you. It was quite unexpected, but I am ready for a fresh start.
translation.es: Gracias. Fue inesperado, pero estoy lista para un nuevo comienzo.

translation.en: My salon in St. Louis is doing so well.
translation.es: A mi peluquería de San Luis le va muy bien.

translation.en: I heard Indianapolis is booming
and in dire need of a woman with my talents, so I figured, why not?
translation.es: y necesita desesperadamente una mujer con mis talentos, y pensé: ¿por qué no?

translation.en: How are you doing, Sarah?
Haven't heard hide nor hair about your little company.
translation.es: No he oído nada sobre tu compañía.

translation.en: I'm doin' good. Real good. In fact--
translation.es: Estoy bien. Muy bien. De hecho...

translation.en: Well, I best be getting back.
You have a blessed day now, Addie.
translation.es: Que tengas un buen día, Addie.

translation.en: You see that?
-The black eye? -Mm-hmm.
I heard Jean used to beat her silly.
He probably ain't dead. -‹She just running. -Mm-hmm.
translation.es: Probablemente, no está muerto. Ella debe haber huido.

translation.en: Guess light-skin don't mean you gonna have a happy marriage.
translation.es: Supongo que una piel clara no asegura un matrimonio feliz.

translation.en: You know, all we women in the same boat.
translation.es: Todas somos mujeres en el mismo barco.

translation.en: Please. She ain't as much as set a toe in our boat.
translation.es: Por favor. No ha puesto ni un dedo en nuestro bote.

translation.en: Always gon' be easier for the likes of Addie.
translation.es: Siempre será más fácil para la gente como Addie.

translation.en: Soon as she open her salon, all my customers gonna flock to her.
translation.es: En cuanto abra su peluquería, mis clientas irán con ella.

translation.en: Don't say that.
Gotta find a way to set myself apart.
translation.es: Debo encontrar la forma de distinguirme.

translation.en: [CJ] Riots in seven cities.
[Ransom] I heard ten.
Twenty-six Negroes killed.
All because of Jack Johnson winnin' the fight.
translation.es: Todo porque Jack Johnson ganó la pelea.

translation.en: My, my, Gertrude. You look like a schoolgirl.
That hair sure is growin'.
I can't believe it. My hair ain't never reached my shoulders before.
translation.es: No puedo creerlo. Mi pelo nunca me había llegado a los hombros.

translation.en: I see you, Annabelle. Lookin' good.
Sarah Walker, you are royalty.
translation.es: Sarah Walker, eres de la realeza.

translation.en: We oughta call you Madam.
How you doin', Addie?
Oh, blessed and highly favored.
Love that.
So elegant.
-♪ I sing because I'm happy ♪ -♪ Ooh ♪
♪ I sing because I'm free ♪
♪ His eye is on the sparrow ♪
translation.es: Su ojo está en el gorrión

translation.en: ♪ And I know that he watches me ♪
translation.es: Y sé que él me observa

translation.en: ♪ He watches me ♪
Please be seated.
[minister] Can I get an amen?
[all] Amen.
[minister] Ah, yes, indeed.
Those that are new to Bethel AME,
translation.es: Aquellos que sean nuevos en esta iglesia,

translation.en: please rise and let us acknowledge your divine presence.
translation.es: levántense y permítannos reconocer su presencia divina.

translation.en: [woman whispers] What is she doin'?
[CJ] Where's she goin'?
Ain't no one tell her to go up there.
translation.es: Nadie le dijo que fuera ahí.

translation.en: Thank y'all for welcoming me.
I happen to need a fellowship.
[all] Amen.
Just as Jesus has guided my path, and you have opened your doors to me,
translation.es: Así como Jesús ha guiado mi camino, y ustedes me han abierto las puertas...

translation.en: I would like to open the doors of my new salon to you.
translation.es: ...yo quisiera abrirles las puertas de mi nueva peluquería.

translation.en: Addie's won't be no ordinary salon. No, Lord.
translation.es: La mía no será una peluquería común. No, Señor.

translation.en: Next week in the heart of downtown,
translation.es: La próxima semana, en el centro,

translation.en: I will open the first freestanding storefront,
translation.es: abriré la primera tienda independiente en todo Indiana,

translation.en: not in someone's kitchen, colored salon in all of Indiana.
translation.es: un salón de belleza para gente de color, y no será en una cocina.

translation.en: Thank you.
[echoing faintly] I would like to take this time
to acknowledge those that aren't with us...
translation.es: para recordar a los que no están más con nosotros...

translation.en: Babe.
[minister] Those that weren't able to make it here today.
translation.es: ...a los que ya no están presentes.

translation.en: [Addie, echoing] Colored women will do anything to look like me...
translation.es: Las mujeres de color harán lo que sea para verse como yo.

translation.en: even if deep down, they know they can't.
translation.es: Aunque en el fondo sepan que no pueden.

translation.en: Now we've got a good arrangement here.
Laundry for hair treatments.
translation.es: Lavandería a cambio de tratamientos capilares.

translation.en: Let's not complicate things.
These are my products.
And I will not have the likes of you associated with them.
translation.es: Y no tendré gente como tú asociada con ellos.

translation.en: Sarah, come on, open up, now.
Girl, I see you in there. Come on. Open up.
[Addie] You'll fail soon enough.
[referee] Two...
[Addie] And when you do...
[referee] ...four...
[Addie] ...I got a hamper full of dirty laundry with your name on it.
translation.es: ...tengo un cesto lleno de ropa sucia con tu nombre.

translation.en: -[CJ] What's goin' on, now? -Saints.
-Sarah... -Can I have your attention, please?
Can I have your attention?
I just wanna share...
the divine message God just sent me.
translation.es: ...el mensaje divino que Dios me acaba de enviar.

translation.en: Now so many of y'all in the congregation have flourished using my product.
translation.es: Muchos de la congregación han florecido usando mi producto.

translation.en: Which is why the good Lord...
oh, is he ever so good...
[all] Yes, he is.
...gave me the vision
to lower the price of my Hair Grower as a thank you.
translation.es: de bajar el precio de mi producto como agradecimiento.

translation.en: Buy one, get one free. Can I get an amen?
translation.es: Compren uno y el siguiente es gratis. Amén.

translation.en: [all] Amen!
I'll be taking orders in the front of the church.
translation.es: Tomaré pedidos frente a la iglesia.

translation.en: First five ladies get free hair stylin', tell all your friends.
translation.es: Las primeras cinco recibirán un peinado gratis. Díganselo a todos.

translation.en: Thank you, Jesus. Thank you.
[CJ] It's gonna take us months to fill these orders.
translation.es: Tardaremos meses en completar estos pedidos.

translation.en: We ain't got enough workers, or storage, or equipment.
translation.es: No tenemos suficientes trabajadores ni almacenamiento ni equipo.

translation.en: This is a house, baby. It ain't a damn factory.
translation.es: Es una casa, no una maldita fábrica.

translation.en: We can do it, CJ. We are doin' it!
translation.es: Podemos hacerlo, C. J. ¡Lo estamos haciendo!

translation.en: It's doin' good.
-What was that? -[voice shouting]
[Sarah] Everybody out! Come on!
-[Lelia] Go! -[CJ] There's a fire!
-[Lelia] Where's John at? -[Ransom] I don't know. It was his shift.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está John? No lo sé. Era su turno.

translation.en: [CJ] No! I'll get him. Y'all, go on out! I got it!
Hey, what's goin' on?
-Did you leave the product burning? -I just stepped outside to smoke.
translation.es: - ¿Dejaste el producto al fuego? - Salí a fumar.

translation.en: -This is all your f-- -[loud blast]
[Lelia] Mama!
[man] Right here.
[man] Hurry up, now!
[man] Can you pump it any quicker?
All right, keep it goin'.
I never should've let her get to me.
translation.es: No debí dejar que me convenciera.

translation.en: I should've kept my eye on the sparrow.
It's okay, baby. It's okay.
How we gonna eat?
-Where we gonna sleep? -We gonna figure it out.
Get a job at the hotel if we have to.
translation.es: Trabajaremos en el hotel si es necesario.

translation.en: -We'll figure it out. -[sighs]
[man] Come on, now, hurry up!
But if you need a place to go, then, you know where to come,
translation.es: Si necesitan un lugar, ya saben adónde ir,

translation.en: until Sarah gets back on her feet.
You know, let's hope she does that.
I'm right here for you in the meantime. Okay, ladies?
translation.es: Mientras tanto, yo estoy aquí para ustedes, ¿sí?

translation.en: That's very important that you have somewhere to get your hair done.
translation.es: Es muy importante que tengan dónde peinarse.

translation.en: Sarah, I am so sorry.
I came as soon as I could.
You are so brave.
[Sarah] Please.
Save the crocodile tears. You know you came to gloat.
translation.es: Deja las lágrimas de cocodrilo. Viniste a regodearte.

translation.en: You're upset, so I won't take that personally.
translation.es: Estás molesta, no lo tomaré personalmente.

translation.en: Uh, I just came to offer my services, free of charge, to all of your clients.
translation.es: Solo vine a ofrecer mis servicios, gratis, a todas tus clientas.

translation.en: You ain't comin' up here stealin' my customers.
Well, I would never steal.
You had your foot on my throat for years.
Told me I was worthless, useless, too dark to shine.
translation.es: Me dijiste que no valía nada, que era una inútil, muy oscura para brillar.

translation.en: But the mere inkling that I might be doin' well
translation.es: Pero el simple presentimiento de que me fuera bien

translation.en: made you move over a thousand miles, clear across country, just to dim my light.
translation.es: te hizo mudarte a miles de kilómetros, cruzar el país, solo para atenuar mi luz.

translation.en: You are out of your mind.
Find yourself a new whipping post 'cause them days is over for me.
translation.es: Ve a denigrar a otra. Esos días terminaron para mí.

translation.en: In fact, take a seat. 'Cause I'm about to replace all this with a factory.
translation.es: De hecho, siéntate, porque reemplazaré esto con una fábrica.

translation.en: And leave you in the dust.
-Sarah... -No, no, no, no, no.
You want to speak to me?
You call me Madam CJ Walker.
